name: emogeez-parser
description: A toolbox for parsing emojis in texts.

scripts.prepublish: yarn run transpile && yarn run test
scripts.test: yarn run lint:js --quiet && yarn run coverage
scripts.mocha: NODE_ENV=test mocha --compilers js:babel-register --timeout 5000 -r tests/bootstrap.js -r babel-polyfill $(find lib -name '*.test.js')
